gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pistons 133, Kings 120
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pistons defeated the Kings, 133-120. Jaden Ivey led the Pistons with a career-high 37 points, along with six rebounds and seven assists as Jalen Duren (20 points, 15 rebounds, six assists) and Alex Burks (25 points, seven rebounds) totaled 45 points. Domantas Sabonis led the Kings with his 33rd consecutive double double as he compiled 30 points, 12 rebounds, and seven assists as Malik Monk added 23 points, five rebounds, and 10 assists.
